Title: Creates special proceedings for freedom of information law and open meetings law reviews
Summary: Creates special proceedings for freedom of information law and open meetings law reviews; directs the chief administrator of the courts to establish a freedom of information law and open meetings law review program in the supreme court, whereby individuals may file a petition for review of a freedom of information law request or open meetings law claim.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to creating special proceedings for freedom of information law and open meetings law reviews
